verses.roman:
sabe āsi' mililā prabhura śrī-caraṇe
prabhu kṛpā kari' sabāya rākhila nija sthāne

synonyms: sabe—all; āsi'—coming; mililā—met; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śrī-caraṇe—under the shelter; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛpā kari'—showing mercy; sabāya—every one of them; rākhila—kept; nija sthāne—under His protection.
translation: Since all the devotees came to Him for shelter, Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu showed them all mercy and kept them under His protection.
